divs: Sighting DetailsRight before I go to bed I scan the skies for stars and anything unusual. I observed a twinkling low in the sky star like object in the Southwest skies of Oakland County. Too low to be a star so I went for the binoculars. Once focused, I was viewing an oval (ish) object hovering with blinking red, blue and magenta like colors. It also had a brighness in the middle. It seemed to change colors in repeating bursts. I went for the telescope in another room. By the time I get it positioned, the "craft" was gone. This was no fixed wing or rotor aircraft. Did anyone else see this?
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Royal Oak
There were no other sightings in Royal Oak on or around April 6th 2010
